title: Orianna's ball
body: Hey folks, it was in my last game when i played orianna and sometimes even if the ball was on me there was no visual effect ( there was no ball on the champion)

replies.body:
Hey Am I Late 421 - 

Thanks for the report! Have you seen this occur in any other games, or was this in one particular match? It may have been an issue with an asset loading into the game if it only happened in one match. If it's happening consistently, I would suggest completing a client repair, as an asset in your client files may have become jumbled.

Hey Katey this is bug thats been around a few patches and has stopped me personally from playing orianna. I was told in another thread that it isn't game-breaking so it isn't getting fixed anytime soon. The bug happens when Orianna e's someone and they die or leash the ball before it quite makes it to them, this creates a fake ball indicator (this can stack to 3+ indicators) and can also turn the ball invisible until death. With the ball invisible and having multiple indicators it is near impossible to keep track of its location. I have experienced it in at least 3 different matches before I stopped playing her (one was even with a rioter I mentioned it to).

I got the extra indicator to disappear in one of my games.
If the same champ that made the extra indicator dies again with the ball on its way the indicator disappeared for me.
Was ARAM and was with a Malphite so I had plenty of chances to try him dying with the ball lol.
